title: HIGH SCHOOL ROUNDUP Foran into semifinals
title_page: HIGH SCHOOL ROUNDUP Foran into semifinals
maintext:
MILFORD — The Foran girls tennis team advanced to the Class M quarterfinals with a 4-3 first round win over New Fairfield Saturday afternoon.
Kyra Johnson and Sarah Lockwood won at No. 2 and No. 3 singles, respectively, and the No. 2 doubles team of Arshi Puri and Julia Harrington and No. 3 doubles team of Meghan Stokes and Zoe Eichner were victorious for the fifth-seeded Lions, who will play at fourth-seeded RHAM on Tuesday at 3.
Class M first round
(at Foran): singles: Amber Perry (NF) def. Grace Hiza 4-6, 6-1, 6-3; Kyra Johnson (F) def. Dana Nevins 6-2, 6-4; Sarah Lockwood (F) def. Lena Ciardi 6-2, 6-3; Lucie Tuthill (NF) def. Eleanor Noyes 6-3, 6-4; doubles: Lili Racaj/Megan Rahmati (NF) def. Izzy Connelly/Natalie Hubler 6-2, 7-6 (7-4); Arshi Puri/Julia Harrington (F) def. Kelsey Finlay/Kellie Murtha 6-3, 6-4; Meghan Stokes/Zoe Eichner (F) def. Melanie Grasso/Emily King 2-6, 6-4, 6-4.
TRUMBULL 5, POMPERAUG 2
Class L qualifying round
(at New Canaan): singles: Unique Akinloye (T) def. Lila Vogel 6-0, 6-2; Zoe Klein (P) def. Julia Louw 6-3, 6-0; Lauren Louw (T) def. Meghan Kennedy 6-2, 6-1; Symphony Akinloye (T) def. Francesca Dumont 6-4, 6-3; doubles: Amelia Grasso/Laine Neufeld (T) def. Catherine Lebel/Morgan Duffy 6-3, 6-4; Victoria Gagas/Kira Nyklicek (P) def. Class L qualifying round
BUNNELL000 200 0—2 8 0
WESTON003 010 X—4 5 2
Records: Bunnell 8-13, Weston 9-12. Highlights: W—Daniel Olin pitched a complete game with three strikeouts. Daniel Santa Maria had two hits. Grayson Orr had one RBI. The 32nd seeded Trojans will play at top-seeded Windsor in the first round on Tuesday at 3:30.

BETHEL7
